org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client
Interface Ingest

All Superinterfaces:
ClientBuilder, Feeder
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractIngestClient, BulkClient, IngestClient, IngestDeleteClient, IngestIndexClient, MockBulkClient, MockIngestClient
public interface Ingest
extends ClientBuilder, Feeder

Interface for providing convenient administrative methods for ingesting data into Elasticsearch.
